data.description: Module used to parse Lotus 123 .wk4 files
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Parse::LotusWk4Parser is a step towards writing parsers for the
    Lotus 123 - wk files. (Presently there are no parsers for such file
    formats.) I believe that a lot a user still use non-excel file
    formats like the wk format, so it becomes necessary to provide such
    packages as Perl has to spread everywhere.
